subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Patrik Berglund scored twice and Sweden had three second-period goals to wrap up the group stage of the world championships with a 6-2 victory over the United States in Kosice, Slovakia.
snippet: Patrik Berglund scored twice and Sweden had three second-period goals to wrap up the group stage of the world championships with a 6-2 victory over the United States in Kosice, Slovakia.
